message.content:
cs.DM, cs.DS, cs.CG, cs.GT, cs.CC

Reasoning: 
- cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics): The Chinese postman problem is a classic problem in graph theory, which is a subfield of discrete mathematics. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms): The Chinese postman problem is a well-known algorithmic problem, and the paper discusses the complexity of solving it on edge-colored multigraphs. 
- cs.CG (Computational Geometry): The Chinese postman problem can be seen as a problem in computational geometry, as it involves finding a shortest closed walk in a graph. 
- cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory): The Chinese postman problem has applications in game theory, as it can be used to model the problem of a salesman trying to visit a set of cities. 
- cs.CC (Computational Complexity): The paper discusses the complexity of the Chinese postman problem on edge-colored multigraphs, which is a problem in computational complexity.
